query.sql: --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select distinct to_char(d.CREATED, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM, DY') CREATED , d.DBID , d.NAME , i.INST_ID , i.INSTANCE_NAME , d.LOG_MODE , d.OPEN_MODE , i.STATUS INST_STATUS , i.LOGINS , i.DATABASE_STATUS , i.INSTANCE_ROLE , i.ACTIVE_STATE , i.VERSION , to_char(i.STARTUP_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM, DY') STARTUP_TIME , (systimestamp-i.STARTUP_TIME) UPTIME , i.HOST_NAME , d.FORCE_LOGGING , tp.platform_name , tp.endian_format from gv$instance i , gv$database d , gv$transportable_platform tp where lower(d.name) = lower(substr(i.INSTANCE_NAME, 1, length(d.NAME))) AND d.platform_id = tp.platform_id order by INSTANCE_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ with dbname as( select name from v$database ) , dbdf as( select sum(BYTES)/(1024*1024) DFMBYTES from dba_data_files ) , dbdf_system as( select sum(BYTES)/(1024*1024) DFMBYTES from dba_data_files where tablespace_name in ('SYSTEM', 'SYSAUX')) , dbdf_undo as( select sum(BYTES)/(1024*1024) DFMBYTES from dba_data_files where tablespace_name in ( select tablespace_name from dba_tablespaces where CONTENTS = 'UNDO' )) , dbdf_application as( select sum(BYTES)/(1024*1024) DFMBYTES from dba_data_files where ( tablespace_name not in ('SYSTEM', 'SYSAUX') and tablespace_name not in ( select tablespace_name from dba_tablespaces where CONTENTS = 'UNDO' ) ) ) , dbtf as( select sum(BYTES)/(1024*1024) TFMBYTES from dba_temp_files ) , dblf as( select sum(BYTES)/(1024*1024) LFMBYTES from gv$log ) , dbtotal as ( select ( select DFMBYTES from dbdf ) + ( select TFMBYTES from dbtf ) + ( select LFMBYTES from dblf ) "DBTOTALMB" from dual ) , app_tablespaces as ( SELECT --b.tablespace_name --, sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)) USED_TOTAL CASE WHEN sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size))/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.900') || ' TB' WHEN sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size))/1024,2),'FM9000.900') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)),'FM9000.900') || ' MB' END USED_TOTAL FROM ( SELECT tablespace_name , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS free_space FROM dba_free_space GROUP BY tablespace_name ) a, ( SELECT t.tablespace_name , CONTENTS , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT , t.STATUS , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS current_size , FLOOR (SUM (DECODE (autoextensible, 'YES', maxbytes, bytes)) / 1024 / 1024) AS max_size , BIGFILE , ENCRYPTED , COUNT (file_name) files FROM dba_data_files df , dba_tablespaces t where t.tablespace_name = df.tablespace_name GROUP BY t.tablespace_name , CONTENTS , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT , t.STATUS , BIGFILE , ENCRYPTED ) b WHERE a.tablespace_name(+) = b.tablespace_name and b.CONTENTS = 'PERMANENT' and b.tablespace_name not in ('SYSTEM','SYSAUX') ) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ select SYSDATE "DATE" , ( select name from dbname ) "DB NAME" , ( select CASE WHEN DFMBYTES >= (1024*1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(DFMBYTES/(1024*1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' TB' WHEN DFMBYTES >= (1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(DFMBYTES/(1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(DFMBYTES, 'FM9900.000') || ' MB' END from dbdf ) DATAFILES , ( select CASE WHEN DFMBYTES >= (1024*1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(DFMBYTES/(1024*1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' TB' WHEN DFMBYTES >= (1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(DFMBYTES/(1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(DFMBYTES, 'FM9900.000') || ' MB' END from dbdf_system ) SYSTEM_DATAFILES , ( select CASE WHEN DFMBYTES >= (1024*1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(DFMBYTES/(1024*1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' TB' WHEN DFMBYTES >= (1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(DFMBYTES/(1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(DFMBYTES, 'FM9900.000') || ' MB' END from dbdf_undo ) UNDO_DATAFILES , ( select CASE WHEN DFMBYTES >= (1024*1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(DFMBYTES/(1024*1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' TB' WHEN DFMBYTES >= (1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(DFMBYTES/(1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(DFMBYTES, 'FM9900.000') || ' MB' END from dbdf_application ) APPLICATION_DATAFILES , (select USED_TOTAL from app_tablespaces) USED_TOTAL , ( select CASE WHEN TFMBYTES >= (1024*1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(TFMBYTES/(1024*1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' TB' WHEN TFMBYTES >= (1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(TFMBYTES/(1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(TFMBYTES, 'FM9900.000') || ' MB' END TEMPFILES from dbtf ) TEMPFILES , ( select CASE WHEN LFMBYTES >= (1024*1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(LFMBYTES/(1024*1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' TB' WHEN LFMBYTES >= (1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(LFMBYTES/(1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(LFMBYTES, 'FM9900.000') || ' MB' END from dblf ) LOGFILES , ( select TO_CHAR(DBTOTALMB,'FM9900000.000') || ' MB' from dbtotal ) "DB TOTAL MB" , ( select TO_CHAR(ROUND(DBTOTALMB/(1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' GB' from dbtotal ) "DB TOTAL GB" , ( select TO_CHAR(ROUND(DBTOTALMB/(1024*1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' TB' from dbtotal ) "DB TOTAL TB" from dual order by SYSDATE
--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) Select PROPERTY_NAME , PROPERTY_VALUE , DESCRIPTION from database_properties ORDER BY PROPERTY_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT COMP_ID , COMP_NAME , VERSION , STATUS , MODIFIED , NAMESPACE , CONTROL , SCHEMA , PROCEDURE , OTHER_SCHEMAS , STARTUP , PARENT_ID FROM dba_registry ORDER BY COMP_ID

with datafiles as ( --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT distinct CASE WHEN instr(b.file_name, '+') > 1 THEN substr(b.file_name, 2, instr(b.file_name, '/',1)-1) WHEN instr(b.file_name, '/',2) > 1 THEN substr(b.file_name, 1, instr(b.file_name, '/',2)-1) WHEN instr(b.file_name, '\',1) > 1 THEN substr(b.file_name, 1, instr(b.file_name, '\',1)-1) END "FILE SYSTEM/DISK GROUP" FROM ( SELECT file_id, FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS free_space FROM dba_free_space GROUP BY file_id ) A, ( SELECT df.file_id , df.file_name , d.block_size , d.creation_time , df.tablespace_name , FLOOR ((df.bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS current_size , FLOOR ((DECODE (df.autoextensible, 'YES', df.maxbytes, df.bytes)) / 1024 / 1024) AS max_size , CASE WHEN df.autoextensible = 'YES' THEN case when df.increment_by < 128 then df.increment_by*8||' KB' else floor(df.increment_by/128)||' MB' END --floor(df.increment_by/128) else 00.00||' KB' end increment_by , df.ONLINE_STATUS FROM dba_data_files df , v$datafile d where df.file_id = d.file# ) b WHERE A.file_id(+) = b.file_id /* ORDER BY tablespace_name , b.file_id , file_name */ ) , redologs as ( select distinct CASE WHEN instr(b.member, '+') > 1 THEN substr(b.member, 2, instr(b.member, '/',1)-1) WHEN instr(b.member, '/',2) > 1 THEN substr(b.member, 1, instr(b.member, '/',2)-1) WHEN instr(b.member, '\',1) > 1 THEN substr(b.member, 1, instr(b.member, '\',1)-1) END "FILE SYSTEM/DISK GROUP" from gv$log a , gv$logfile b , gv$thread c where a.inst_id = b.inst_id AND a.inst_id = c.inst_id AND a.group# = b.group# AND a.THREAD# = c.THREAD# AND a.inst_id = c.THREAD# order by /* a.inst_id , a.thread# , a.group# , */ "FILE SYSTEM/DISK GROUP" ) , controlfiles as ( select distinct CASE WHEN instr(b.NAME, '+') > 1 THEN substr(b.NAME, 2, instr(b.NAME, '/',1)-1) WHEN instr(b.NAME, '/',2) > 1 THEN substr(b.NAME, 1, instr(b.NAME, '/',2)-1) WHEN instr(b.NAME, '\',1) > 1 THEN substr(b.NAME, 1, instr(b.NAME, '\',1)-1) END "FILE SYSTEM/DISK GROUP" from gv$controlfile b ) , FRA as ( select value from gv$parameter where name = 'db_recovery_file_dest' ) ------------------------ --, diskgroups as --( select "FILE SYSTEM/DISK GROUP" from datafiles union select "FILE SYSTEM/DISK GROUP" from redologs union select "FILE SYSTEM/DISK GROUP" from controlfiles union select value "FILE SYSTEM/DISK GROUP" from FRA order by "FILE SYSTEM/DISK GROUP" --)

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT b.tablespace_name , CASE WHEN BLOCK_SIZE = '32768' THEN '32K' WHEN BLOCK_SIZE = '16384' THEN '16K' WHEN BLOCK_SIZE = '8192' THEN '8K' WHEN BLOCK_SIZE = '4096' THEN '4K' ELSE to_char(BLOCK_SIZE) END BLOCK_SIZE , CASE WHEN current_size >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(current_size/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN current_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(current_size/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(current_size,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END ACTUAL , CASE WHEN nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END USED , CASE WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(free_space,0),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END FREE , CASE WHEN (current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8 >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN (current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8 >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR((current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END "PCT80" , CASE WHEN max_size >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/(1024*1024),3),'FM99000.00') || ' TB' WHEN max_size = 32767 THEN TO_CHAR(32767, 'FM99000.00')||' MB' WHEN max_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/1024,3),'FM99000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(max_size,'FM99000.00') || ' MB' END MAX , nvl(ROUND ( ( (current_size - free_space) / max_size) * 100),2) pct_used , files , BIGFILE , ENCRYPTED , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT EXTENT_MGMT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT SEGMENT_SPACE_MGMT , STATUS FROM ( SELECT tablespace_name , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS free_space FROM dba_free_space GROUP BY tablespace_name ) a, ( SELECT t.tablespace_name , BLOCK_SIZE , CONTENTS , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT , t.STATUS , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS current_size , FLOOR (SUM (DECODE (autoextensible, 'YES', maxbytes, bytes)) / 1024 / 1024) AS max_size , BIGFILE , ENCRYPTED , COUNT (file_name) files FROM dba_data_files df , dba_tablespaces t where t.tablespace_name = df.tablespace_name GROUP BY t.tablespace_name , BLOCK_SIZE , CONTENTS , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT , t.STATUS , BIGFILE , ENCRYPTED ) b WHERE a.tablespace_name(+) = b.tablespace_name and b.CONTENTS = 'PERMANENT' ORDER BY tablespace_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT b.tablespace_name , CASE WHEN BLOCK_SIZE = '32768' THEN '32K' WHEN BLOCK_SIZE = '16384' THEN '16K' WHEN BLOCK_SIZE = '8192' THEN '8K' WHEN BLOCK_SIZE = '4096' THEN '4K' ELSE to_char(BLOCK_SIZE) END BLOCK_SIZE , CASE WHEN current_size >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(current_size/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN current_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(current_size/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(current_size,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END ACTUAL , CASE WHEN nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END USED , CASE WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(free_space,0),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END FREE , CASE WHEN (current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8 >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN (current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8 >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR((current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END "PCT80" , CASE WHEN max_size >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/(1024*1024),3),'FM99000.00') || ' TB' WHEN max_size = 32767 THEN TO_CHAR(32767, 'FM99000.00')||' MB' WHEN max_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/1024,3),'FM99000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(max_size,'FM99000.00') || ' MB' END MAX , nvl(ROUND ( ( (current_size - free_space) / max_size) * 100),2) pct_used , files , BIGFILE , ENCRYPTED , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT EXTENT_MGMT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT SEGMENT_SPACE_MGMT , STATUS FROM ( SELECT tablespace_name , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS free_space FROM dba_free_space GROUP BY tablespace_name ) a, ( SELECT t.tablespace_name , BLOCK_SIZE , CONTENTS , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT , t.STATUS , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS current_size , FLOOR (SUM (DECODE (autoextensible, 'YES', maxbytes, bytes)) / 1024 / 1024) AS max_size , BIGFILE , ENCRYPTED , COUNT (file_name) files FROM dba_data_files df , dba_tablespaces t where t.tablespace_name = df.tablespace_name GROUP BY t.tablespace_name , BLOCK_SIZE , CONTENTS , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT , t.STATUS , BIGFILE , ENCRYPTED ) b WHERE a.tablespace_name(+) = b.tablespace_name and b.CONTENTS = 'UNDO' ORDER BY tablespace_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT b.tablespace_name , CASE WHEN BLOCK_SIZE = '32768' THEN '32K' WHEN BLOCK_SIZE = '16384' THEN '16K' WHEN BLOCK_SIZE = '8192' THEN '8K' WHEN BLOCK_SIZE = '4096' THEN '4K' ELSE to_char(BLOCK_SIZE) END BLOCK_SIZE , CASE WHEN current_size >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(current_size/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN current_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(current_size/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(current_size,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END ACTUAL , CASE WHEN nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(current_size - free_space, current_size),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END USED , CASE WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(free_space,0),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END FREE , CASE WHEN (current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8 >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN (current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8 >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND((current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR((current_size-nvl(free_space,0))/0.8,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END "PCT80" , CASE WHEN max_size >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/(1024*1024),3),'FM90000.00') || ' TB' WHEN max_size = 32767 THEN TO_CHAR(32767, 'FM90000.00')||' MB' WHEN max_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/1024,3),'FM90000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(max_size,'FM90000.00') || ' MB' END MAX , nvl(ROUND ( ( (current_size - free_space) / max_size) * 100),2) pct_used , files , BIGFILE , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT EXTENT_MGMT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT SEGMENT_SPACE_MGMT , STATUS FROM ( SELECT tablespace_name , FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS free_space FROM dba_free_space GROUP BY tablespace_name ) a, ( SELECT t.tablespace_name , BLOCK_SIZE , CONTENTS , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT , t.STATUS , FLOOR (SUM (tf.bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS current_size , FLOOR (SUM (DECODE (tf.autoextensible, 'YES', maxbytes, bytes)) / 1024 / 1024) AS max_size , t.BIGFILE , COUNT (tf.file_name) files FROM dba_temp_files tf , dba_tablespaces t where t.tablespace_name = tf.tablespace_name GROUP BY t.tablespace_name , BLOCK_SIZE , CONTENTS , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT , t.STATUS , BIGFILE ) b WHERE A.tablespace_name(+) = b.tablespace_name ORDER BY tablespace_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2019/09/18 (of last update/validation) SELECT b.file_id file# , tablespace_name , CASE WHEN instr(b.file_name, '/',-1) > 1 THEN substr(b.file_name, 1, instr(b.file_name, '/',-1)-1) WHEN instr(b.file_name, '\',-1) > 1 THEN substr(b.file_name, 1, instr(b.file_name, '\',-1)-1) END "FILE SYSTEM/DISK GROUP" , b.file_name , CASE WHEN b.BLOCK_SIZE = '32768' THEN '32K' WHEN b.BLOCK_SIZE = '16384' THEN '16K' WHEN b.BLOCK_SIZE = '8192' THEN '8K' WHEN b.BLOCK_SIZE = '4096' THEN '4K' ELSE to_char(b.BLOCK_SIZE) END BLOCK_SIZE , b.creation_time , CASE WHEN current_size >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(current_size/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN current_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(current_size/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(current_size,'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END ACTUAL , CASE WHEN nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(current_size - free_space,current_size),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END USED , CASE WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN nvl(free_space,0) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(free_space,0)/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl(free_space,0),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' END FREE , CASE WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (B.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1 THEN TO_CHAR((B.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1, 'FM90000.00')||' MB' ELSE CASE --WHEN max_size >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN max_size >= (B.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1 THEN TO_CHAR((B.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1, 'FM90000.00')||' MB' --WHEN max_size >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(max_size/1024,2),'FM00000.00') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(max_size,'FM00000.00') || ' MB' END END MAX , increment_by "INCREMENT" , case WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (B.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1 THEN TO_CHAR((B.BLOCK_SIZE*4)-1, 'FM90000.00')||' MB' ELSE CASE WHEN ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)) >= (1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8)/(1024),2), 'FM90000.00')||' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(nvl((current_size-free_space)/0.8,current_size/0.8), 'FM90000.00') || ' MB' END END "PCT80" , TO_CHAR(ROUND(nvl(((current_size - free_space) / max_size) * 100,current_size/max_size*100),2), 'FM900.00') pct_used , ONLINE_STATUS STATUS FROM (SELECT file_id, FLOOR (SUM (bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS free_space FROM dba_free_space GROUP BY file_id ) A, ( SELECT df.file_id , df.file_name , d.block_size , d.creation_time , df.tablespace_name , FLOOR ((df.bytes) / 1024 / 1024) AS current_size , FLOOR ((DECODE (df.autoextensible, 'YES', df.maxbytes, df.bytes)) / 1024 / 1024) AS max_size , CASE WHEN df.autoextensible = 'YES' THEN case when (increment_by * d.block_size) > 1024*1024*1024 then (increment_by * d.block_size)/1024/1024/1024 || ' GB' when (increment_by * d.block_size) > 1024*1024 then (increment_by * d.block_size)/1024/1024 || ' MB' else (increment_by * d.block_size)/1024||' KB' END end increment_by , df.ONLINE_STATUS FROM dba_data_files df , v$datafile d where df.file_id = d.file# ) b WHERE A.file_id(+) = b.file_id ORDER BY tablespace_name , b.file_id --, filesys , file_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select a.inst_id , a.thread# , a.group# , a.SEQUENCE# , substr(b.member, 1, instr(b.member, '/',-1)-1) "FILE SYSTEM/DISK GROUP" , b.member , TO_CHAR(a.bytes/1024/1024, 'FM9000.00')||' MB' "REDO SIZE" , a.status , TO_CHAR(last_redo_time, 'DY YYYY-MON-DD HH:MI:SS AM') last_redo_time , TO_CHAR(checkpoint_time, 'DY YYYY-MON-DD HH:MI:SS AM') checkpoint_time from gv$log a , gv$logfile b , gv$thread c where a.inst_id = b.inst_id AND a.inst_id = c.inst_id AND a.group# = b.group# AND a.THREAD# = c.THREAD# AND a.inst_id = c.THREAD# order by a.inst_id , a.thread# , a.group# , "FILE SYSTEM/DISK GROUP"
--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select NAME , STATUS , IS_RECOVERY_DEST_FILE , BLOCK_SIZE , FILE_SIZE_BLKS from gv$controlfile order by NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) with schema_storage as ( select owner , segment_type , sum(bytes) BYTES_RAW , CASE WHEN sum(s.BYTES) >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(s.BYTES)/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),3),'FM9000.000') || ' PB' WHEN sum(s.BYTES) >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(s.BYTES)/(1024*1024*1024*1024),3),'FM9000.000') || ' TB' WHEN sum(s.BYTES) >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(s.BYTES)/(1024*1024*1024),3),'FM9000.000') || ' GB' WHEN sum(s.BYTES) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(s.BYTES)/(1024*1024),3),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN sum(s.BYTES) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(s.BYTES)/1024,3),'FM9000.000') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(s.BYTES),'FM9000.00') || ' ' END BYTES from dba_segments s where owner not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'PUBLIC' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ---- 12c ---- , 'APEX_050000' , 'AUDSYS' , 'DBSFWUSER' , 'GSMADMIN_INTERNAL' , 'REMOTE_SCHEDULER_AGENT' ) group by owner , segment_type order by owner , segment_type ) -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- select (select name from v$database) DBNAME , owner , segment_type --, BYTES_RAW , bytes , CASE WHEN round(sum(BYTES_RAW) over (partition by owner order by owner, segment_type)) > (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(round(sum(BYTES_RAW/1024/1024/1024/1024) over (partition by owner order by owner, segment_type),3),'FM9000.000')||' TB' WHEN round(sum(BYTES_RAW) over (partition by owner order by owner, segment_type)) > (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(round(sum(BYTES_RAW/1024/1024/1024) over (partition by owner order by owner, segment_type),3),'FM9000.000')||' GB' WHEN round(sum(BYTES_RAW) over (partition by owner order by owner, segment_type)) > (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(round(sum(BYTES_RAW/1024/1024) over (partition by owner order by owner, segment_type),3),'FM9000.000')||' MB' WHEN round(sum(BYTES_RAW) over (partition by owner order by owner, segment_type)) > 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(round(sum(BYTES_RAW/1024) over (partition by owner order by owner, segment_type),3),'FM9000.000')|| ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(round(sum(BYTES_RAW) over (partition by owner order by owner, segment_type),2),'FM9000.000')|| ' B' END total_storage from schema_storage group by owner , BYTES_RAW , bytes , segment_type order by owner , segment_type

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select owner --, object_type , status , count(*) "COUNT" --, sum(COUNT(*)) over (order by owner, status) "RUNNING TOTAL" , sum(COUNT(*)) over (partition by owner order by owner, status) "RUNNING TOTAL" from dba_objects where owner not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'PUBLIC' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ---- 12c ---- , 'APEX_050000' , 'AUDSYS' , 'DBSFWUSER' , 'GSMADMIN_INTERNAL' , 'REMOTE_SCHEDULER_AGENT' ) group by owner --, object_type , status order by owner --, object_type , status

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select OWNER , CREATED , LAST_DDL_TIME , OBJECT_TYPE , OBJECT_NAME , STATUS from dba_objects where STATUS = 'INVALID' and owner not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ---- 12c ---- , 'APEX_050000' , 'AUDSYS' , 'DBSFWUSER' , 'GSMADMIN_INTERNAL' , 'REMOTE_SCHEDULER_AGENT' ) order by owner , object_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , OCCUPANT_NAME , OCCUPANT_DESC , SCHEMA_NAME , MOVE_PROCEDURE , MOVE_PROCEDURE_DESC , SPACE_USAGE_KBYTES from gv$sysaux_occupants order by OCCUPANT_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT inst_id , (select :INSTANCE_NAME from dual) INSTANCE_NAME , (select :HOST_NAME from dual) HOST , stat_name , CASE WHEN VALUE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(VALUE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM99000.00') || ' TB' WHEN VALUE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(VALUE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM99000.00') || ' GB' WHEN VALUE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(VALUE/(1024*1024),2),'FM99000.00') || ' MB' WHEN VALUE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(VALUE/1024,2),'FM99000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(VALUE,'FM99000.00') || ' ' END VALUE FROM gv$osstat WHERE stat_name IN ('NUM_CPUS', 'NUM_CPU_CORES', 'NUM_CPU_SOCKETS', 'PHYSICAL_MEMORY_BYTES', 'LOAD', 'FREE_MEMORY_BYTES') ORDER BY inst_id , stat_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT U1.DBID , U1.NAME , U1.VERSION , U1.DETECTED_USAGES , U1.TOTAL_SAMPLES , U1.CURRENTLY_USED , U1.FIRST_USAGE_DATE , U1.LAST_USAGE_DATE , U1.AUX_COUNT , U1.FEATURE_INFO , U1.LAST_SAMPLE_DATE , U1.LAST_SAMPLE_PERIOD , U1.SAMPLE_INTERVAL , U1.DESCRIPTION FROM dba_feature_usage_statistics u1 WHERE u1.dbid = ( SELECT dbid FROM v$database ) AND u1.version = ( SELECT MAX(u2.version) FROM dba_feature_usage_statistics u2 WHERE u2.name = u1.name ) ORDER BY U1.NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2019/07/24 (of last update/validation) SELECT HOST , DNA.ACL , DNAP.PRINCIPAL , DNAP.PRIVILEGE , DNAP.IS_GRANT , DNA.LOWER_PORT , DNA.UPPER_PORT , DNAP.START_DATE , DNAP.END_DATE , DNAP.ACL_OWNER FROM DBA_NETWORK_ACLS DNA , DBA_NETWORK_ACL_PRIVILEGES DNAP WHERE DNA.ACLID = DNAP.ACLID ORDER BY HOST
--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT 'Feature available only in 12c and later' "Patch Info" from dual order by "Patch Info"

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select :NAME DB_NAME , PATCH_ID , PATCH_UID , VERSION , FLAGS , ACTION , STATUS , INSTALL_ID , ACTION_TIME , DESCRIPTION , BUNDLE_SERIES , BUNDLE_ID , BUNDLE_DATA , PATCH_DESCRIPTOR , PATCH_DIRECTORY , LOGFILE from dba_registry_sqlpatch order by PATCH_ID , PATCH_UID

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select PATCH_ID , PATCH_UID --, VERSION , FLAGS , ACTION , STATUS , INSTALL_ID , ACTION_TIME , DESCRIPTION --, BUNDLE_SERIES --, BUNDLE_ID --, BUNDLE_DATA --, PATCH_DESCRIPTOR , PATCH_DIRECTORY , LOGFILE from dba_registry_sqlpatch order by PATCH_ID , PATCH_UID
--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , PARAMETER , VALUE from GV$OPTION ORDER BY INST_ID , PARAMETER

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , (select INSTANCE_NAME from gv$instance gvi where gvi.inst_id = GV$PARAMETER.inst_id) INSTANCE_NAME , NAME , CASE WHEN NAME in ( 'memory_target' , 'memory_max_target' , 'sga_target' , 'sga_max_size' , 'streams_pool_size' , 'pga_aggregate_target' , 'db_recovery_file_dest_size' ) THEN CASE WHEN VALUE > to_number(1024*1024*1024) THEN round(to_number(VALUE)/1024/1024/1024,3)||'G' WHEN VALUE > to_number(1024*1024) THEN round(to_number(VALUE)/1024/1024,3)||'M' WHEN VALUE > to_number(1024) THEN round(to_number(VALUE)/1024,3)||'K' ELSE VALUE END ELSE VALUE END "VALUE" , ISDEFAULT "DEFAULT" --, TARGET_GUID from GV$PARAMETER where --( name = 'db_name' and value = :NAME ) AND NAME IN ( 'sga_target' , 'sga_max_size' , 'memory_target' , 'memory_max_target' , 'pga_aggregate_target' , 'streams_pool_size' , 'open_cursors' , 'processes' , 'parallel_max_servers' , 'parallel_min_servers' , 'parallel_servers_target' , 'optimizer_features_enable' , 'compatible' , 'db_name' , 'use_large_pages' , 'db_recovery_file_dest_size' ) order by INST_ID , NAME
--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select distinct NAME , VALUE from GV$RMAN_CONFIGURATION order by NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , NAME , ISDEPRECATED from GV$PARAMETER where ISDEPRECATED = 'TRUE' and (name, value) in (select name, value from GV$SPPARAMETER where value is not null) order by INST_ID , NAME

select INST_ID , POOL , NAME , CASE WHEN BYTES > to_number(1024*1024*1024) THEN round(to_number(BYTES)/1024/1024/1024,2)||'G' WHEN BYTES > to_number(1024*1024) THEN round(to_number(BYTES)/1024/1024,2)||'M' WHEN BYTES > to_number(1024) THEN round(to_number(BYTES)/1024,2)||'K' ELSE to_char(BYTES) END BYTES from gv$sgastat where inst_id = :INST_ID order by pool , name

select INST_ID , NAME , CASE WHEN UNIT = 'bytes' and VALUE > to_number(1024*1024*1024) THEN round(to_number(VALUE)/1024/1024/1024,2)||'G' WHEN UNIT = 'bytes' and VALUE > to_number(1024*1024) THEN round(to_number(VALUE)/1024/1024,2)||'M' WHEN UNIT = 'bytes' and VALUE > to_number(1024) THEN round(to_number(VALUE)/1024,2)||'K' ELSE to_char(VALUE) END VALUE from gv$pgastat where inst_id = :INST_ID order by NAME
SELECT HOST , LOWER_PORT , UPPER_PORT , ACL , ACLID , ACL_OWNER FROM dba_host_acls ORDER BY host

SELECT PDB_ID , PDB_NAME , DBID , CON_UID , STATUS , CREATION_SCN , VSN , LOGGING , FORCE_LOGGING , FORCE_NOLOGGING , APPLICATION_ROOT , APPLICATION_PDB , APPLICATION_SEED , APPLICATION_ROOT_CON_ID , IS_PROXY_PDB , CON_ID , UPGRADE_PRIORITY , APPLICATION_CLONE , FOREIGN_CDB_DBID , UNPLUG_SCN , FOREIGN_PDB_ID , CREATION_TIME , REFRESH_MODE , REFRESH_INTERVAL , GUID FROM dba_pdbs ORDER BY pdb_name

select PDB_NAME , PDB_ID , PDB_DBID , OP_SCNBAS , OP_SCNWRP , OP_TIMESTAMP , OPERATION , DB_VERSION , CLONED_FROM_PDB_NAME , CLONED_FROM_PDB_DBID , CLONED_FROM_PDB_GUID , DB_NAME , DB_UNIQUE_NAME , DB_DBID , CLONETAG , DB_VERSION_STRING , PDB_GUID from DBA_PDB_HISTORY where PDB_ID = :PDB_ID AND PDB_NAME = :PDB_NAME
select CON_ID , CON_NAME , INSTANCE_NAME , CON_UID , STATE , RESTRICTED , GUID from DBA_PDB_SAVED_STATES where --CON_ID = :CON_ID GUID = :GUID
select DBID , INSTANCE_NUMBER , STARTUP_TIME , CON_DBID , OPEN_TIME , OPEN_MODE , PDB_NAME , CON_ID from DBA_HIST_PDB_INSTANCE where CON_ID = :CON_ID
select SNAP_ID , DBID , INSTANCE_NUMBER , CON_DBID , FLAG , CON_ID from DBA_HIST_PDB_IN_SNAP where CON_ID = :CON_ID
SELECT name , description , type , enabled , roles , context FROM dba_priv_captures ORDER BY name
SELECT plan_id , plan , comments , status , mandatory FROM dba_cdb_rsrc_plans ORDER BY plan
SELECT plan , pluggable_database , shares , utilization_limit , parallel_server_limit FROM dba_cdb_rsrc_plan_directives WHERE plan = :PLAN ORDER BY plan , pluggable_database
SELECT host , lower_port , upper_port , ace_order , start_date , end_date , grant_type , inverted_principal , principal , principal_type , privilege FROM dba_host_aces ORDER BY host , ace_order

SELECT INST_ID , CON_ID , DBID , CON_UID , NAME , OPEN_MODE , RESTRICTED , OPEN_TIME , CREATE_SCN , TOTAL_SIZE , BLOCK_SIZE , RECOVERY_STATUS , SNAPSHOT_PARENT_CON_ID , APPLICATION_ROOT , APPLICATION_PDB , APPLICATION_SEED , APPLICATION_ROOT_CON_ID , APPLICATION_ROOT_CLONE , PROXY_PDB , LOCAL_UNDO , UNDO_SCN , UNDO_TIMESTAMP , CREATION_TIME , PDB_COUNT , AUDIT_FILES_SIZE , MAX_SIZE , MAX_DIAGNOSTICS_SIZE , MAX_AUDIT_SIZE , GUID FROM GV$CONTAINERS ORDER BY CON_ID

select PDB_ID , PDB_NAME , DBID , CON_UID , STATUS , CREATION_SCN , VSN , LOGGING , FORCE_LOGGING , FORCE_NOLOGGING , APPLICATION_ROOT , APPLICATION_PDB , APPLICATION_SEED , APPLICATION_ROOT_CON_ID , IS_PROXY_PDB , CON_ID , UPGRADE_PRIORITY , APPLICATION_CLONE , FOREIGN_CDB_DBID , UNPLUG_SCN , FOREIGN_PDB_ID , CREATION_TIME , REFRESH_MODE , REFRESH_INTERVAL , GUID from DBA_PDBS where DBID = :DBID

select INST_ID , CON_ID , DBID , CON_UID , NAME , OPEN_MODE , RESTRICTED , OPEN_TIME , CREATE_SCN , TOTAL_SIZE , BLOCK_SIZE , RECOVERY_STATUS , SNAPSHOT_PARENT_CON_ID , APPLICATION_ROOT , APPLICATION_PDB , APPLICATION_SEED , APPLICATION_ROOT_CON_ID , APPLICATION_ROOT_CLONE , PROXY_PDB , LOCAL_UNDO , UNDO_SCN , UNDO_TIMESTAMP , CREATION_TIME , DIAGNOSTICS_SIZE , PDB_COUNT , AUDIT_FILES_SIZE , MAX_SIZE , MAX_DIAGNOSTICS_SIZE , MAX_AUDIT_SIZE , GUID from GV$PDBS where DBID = :DBID

select TABLESPACE_NAME , BLOCK_SIZE , INITIAL_EXTENT , NEXT_EXTENT , MIN_EXTENTS , MAX_EXTENTS , MAX_SIZE , PCT_INCREASE , MIN_EXTLEN , STATUS , CONTENTS , LOGGING , FORCE_LOGGING , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT , ALLOCATION_TYPE , PLUGGED_IN , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT , DEF_TAB_COMPRESSION , RETENTION , BIGFILE , PREDICATE_EVALUATION , ENCRYPTED , COMPRESS_FOR , DEF_INMEMORY , DEF_INMEMORY_PRIORITY , DEF_INMEMORY_DISTRIBUTE , DEF_INMEMORY_COMPRESSION , DEF_INMEMORY_DUPLICATE , SHARED , DEF_INDEX_COMPRESSION , INDEX_COMPRESS_FOR , DEF_CELLMEMORY , DEF_INMEMORY_SERVICE , DEF_INMEMORY_SERVICE_NAME , LOST_WRITE_PROTECT , CHUNK_TABLESPACE , CON_ID from cdb_tablespaces where con_id = :CON_ID

select TABLESPACE_NAME , FILE_NAME , FILE_ID , BYTES , BLOCKS , STATUS , RELATIVE_FNO , AUTOEXTENSIBLE , MAXBYTES , MAXBLOCKS , INCREMENT_BY , USER_BYTES , USER_BLOCKS , ONLINE_STATUS , LOST_WRITE_PROTECT , CON_ID from cdb_data_files where con_id= :CON_ID order by tablespace_name , file_id

select FILE_NAME , FILE_ID , TABLESPACE_NAME , BYTES , BLOCKS , STATUS , RELATIVE_FNO , AUTOEXTENSIBLE , MAXBYTES , MAXBLOCKS , INCREMENT_BY , USER_BYTES , USER_BLOCKS , SHARED , INST_ID , CON_ID from cdb_temp_files where con_id=1

select distinct USERNAME , USER_ID , PASSWORD , ACCOUNT_STATUS , LOCK_DATE , EXPIRY_DATE , DEFAULT_TABLESPACE , TEMPORARY_TABLESPACE , LOCAL_TEMP_TABLESPACE , CREATED , PROFILE , INITIAL_RSRC_CONSUMER_GROUP , EXTERNAL_NAME , PASSWORD_VERSIONS , EDITIONS_ENABLED , AUTHENTICATION_TYPE , PROXY_ONLY_CONNECT , COMMON , LAST_LOGIN , ORACLE_MAINTAINED , INHERITED , DEFAULT_COLLATION , IMPLICIT from CDB_USERS where account_status = 'OPEN' and COMMON = 'YES'

select USERNAME , USER_ID , PASSWORD , ACCOUNT_STATUS , LOCK_DATE , EXPIRY_DATE , DEFAULT_TABLESPACE , TEMPORARY_TABLESPACE , LOCAL_TEMP_TABLESPACE , CREATED , PROFILE , INITIAL_RSRC_CONSUMER_GROUP , EXTERNAL_NAME , PASSWORD_VERSIONS , EDITIONS_ENABLED , AUTHENTICATION_TYPE , PROXY_ONLY_CONNECT , COMMON , LAST_LOGIN , ORACLE_MAINTAINED , INHERITED , DEFAULT_COLLATION , IMPLICIT from CDB_USERS where account_status = 'OPEN' and --COMMON = 'NO' AND CON_ID != 1
select ROLE , ROLE_ID , PASSWORD_REQUIRED , AUTHENTICATION_TYPE , COMMON , ORACLE_MAINTAINED , INHERITED , IMPLICIT , CON_ID from cdb_roles where con_id = :CON_ID

select INST_ID , SERVICE_ID , NAME , NAME_HASH , NETWORK_NAME , CREATION_DATE , CREATION_DATE_HASH , GOAL , DTP , BLOCKED , AQ_HA_NOTIFICATION , CLB_GOAL , COMMIT_OUTCOME , RETENTION_TIME , REPLAY_INITIATION_TIMEOUT , GLOBAL , SESSION_STATE_CONSISTENCY , CON_NAME , SQL_TRANSLATION_PROFILE , MAX_LAG_TIME , STOP_OPTION , FAILOVER_RESTORE , DRAIN_TIMEOUT , CON_ID from GV$active_services where con_id = :CON_ID

select OWNER , TABLE_NAME , TABLESPACE_NAME , CLUSTER_NAME , IOT_NAME , STATUS , PCT_FREE , PCT_USED , INI_TRANS , MAX_TRANS , INITIAL_EXTENT , NEXT_EXTENT , MIN_EXTENTS , MAX_EXTENTS , PCT_INCREASE , FREELISTS , FREELIST_GROUPS , LOGGING , BACKED_UP , NUM_ROWS , BLOCKS , EMPTY_BLOCKS , AVG_SPACE , CHAIN_CNT , AVG_ROW_LEN , AVG_SPACE_FREELIST_BLOCKS , NUM_FREELIST_BLOCKS , DEGREE , INSTANCES , CACHE , TABLE_LOCK , SAMPLE_SIZE , LAST_ANALYZED , PARTITIONED , IOT_TYPE , TEMPORARY , SECONDARY , NESTED , BUFFER_POOL , FLASH_CACHE , CELL_FLASH_CACHE , ROW_MOVEMENT , GLOBAL_STATS , USER_STATS , DURATION , SKIP_CORRUPT , MONITORING , CLUSTER_OWNER , DEPENDENCIES , COMPRESSION , COMPRESS_FOR , DROPPED , READ_ONLY , SEGMENT_CREATED , RESULT_CACHE , CLUSTERING , ACTIVITY_TRACKING , DML_TIMESTAMP , HAS_IDENTITY , CONTAINER_DATA , INMEMORY , INMEMORY_PRIORITY , INMEMORY_DISTRIBUTE , INMEMORY_COMPRESSION , INMEMORY_DUPLICATE , DEFAULT_COLLATION , DUPLICATED , SHARDED , EXTERNAL , CELLMEMORY , CONTAINERS_DEFAULT , CONTAINER_MAP , EXTENDED_DATA_LINK , EXTENDED_DATA_LINK_MAP , INMEMORY_SERVICE , INMEMORY_SERVICE_NAME , CONTAINER_MAP_OBJECT , CON_ID from CDB_TABLES where CON_ID = :CON_ID order by owner , table_name
select CON_ID , TIME , NAME , CAUSE , TYPE , ERROR_NUMBER , LINE , MESSAGE , STATUS , ACTION from PDB_PLUG_IN_VIOLATIONS where CON_ID = :CON_ID order by TIME
SELECT inst_id , name , is_top_plan FROM gv$rsrc_plan ORDER BY name
SELECT consumer_group , status , comments FROM dba_rsrc_consumer_groups ORDER BY consumer_group
SELECT inst_id , name , consumed_cpu_time FROM gv$rsrc_consumer_group ORDER BY name
SELECT plan , status , comments FROM dba_rsrc_plans ORDER BY plan
SELECT plan , group_or_subplan , cpu_p1 , cpu_p2 , cpu_p3 , cpu_p4 FROM dba_rsrc_plan_directives WHERE plan = :PLAN ORDER BY plan , cpu_p1 DESC , cpu_p2 DESC , cpu_p3 DESC

/* DO NOT DELETE -- below lines add/format output with ';' BEGIN DBMS_METADATA.set_transform_param (DBMS_METADATA.session_transform, 'SQLTERMINATOR', true); DBMS_METADATA.set_transform_param (DBMS_METADATA.session_transform, 'PRETTY', true); END; /
*/ SELECT DBMS_METADATA.get_ddl ('REF_CONSTRAINT', ac1.constraint_name, ac1.owner) "DDL" FROM all_constraints ac1 JOIN all_constraints ac2 ON ac1.r_owner = ac2.owner AND ac1.r_constraint_name = ac2.constraint_name WHERE ac2.constraint_type IN ('P','U') AND ac1.constraint_type = 'R' AND ac1.owner not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' , 'SYSMAN' , 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' )

select index_owner owner , table_name , index_name , status , logging , segment_created segment , UNIQUENESS , tablespace_name , visibility , listagg(column_name, ', ') within group(order by table_name, index_name, column_position) as column_list , CASE WHEN distinct_keys >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN distinct_keys >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN distinct_keys >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN distinct_keys >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(distinct_keys/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(distinct_keys,'FM000.00') || ' ' END distinct_keys , CASE WHEN NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' T' WHEN NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' B' WHEN NUM_ROWS >= (1000*1000) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/(1000*1000),2),'FM000.00') || ' M' WHEN NUM_ROWS >= 1000 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(NUM_ROWS/1000,2),'FM000.00') || ' K' ELSE TO_CHAR(NUM_ROWS,'FM000.00') || ' ' END NUM_ROWS , to_char(created, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') created , to_char(LAST_DDL_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') LAST_DDL_TIME , to_char(last_analyzed, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') last_analyzed , INDEX_TYPE , FUNCIDX_STATUS , CLUSTERING_FACTOR , DEGREE , INSTANCES , PARTITIONED dba_ind_columns dic , dba_indexes di , dba_ind_expressions die , dba_objects do WHERE --(dic.table_name like trim(upper(:TABLE_NAME)) or instr(dic.TABLE_NAME, trim(upper(:TABLE_NAME))) > 0) AND -- do not delete this line even if it is commented dic.table_name = trim(upper(:TABLE_NAME)) AND --dic.index_owner = upper(:TABLE_OWNER) AND dic.index_name = di.index_name AND dic.index_name = die.index_name(+) AND dic.COLUMN_POSITION = die.COLUMN_POSITION(+) AND dic.index_owner = do.owner AND dic.index_name = do.object_name AND --do.object_type like 'INDEX%' do.object_type = 'INDEX' ORDER BY table_name , index_name , dic.column_position group by table_name, index_name order by table_name, index_name
select a.ROWID , a.obj_name from system.SQLPROF_STGTAB a , system.SQLPROF_STGTAB b where a.obj_name = b.obj_name and a.ROWID > b.ROWID
select 'delete from SQLPROF_STGTAB where rowid = '||:ROWID||';' "DELETE DUPLICATE" from SQLPROF_STGTAB where rowid = :ROWID
select name , line , message from PDB_PLUG_IN_VIOLATIONS

SELECT client_name , status , consumer_group , client_tag --, priority_override , attributes , window_group --, service_name --, resource_percentage , use_resource_estimates , mean_job_duration , mean_job_cpu , mean_job_attempts , mean_incoming_tasks_7_days , mean_incoming_tasks_30_days , total_cpu_last_7_days , total_cpu_last_30_days , max_duration_last_7_days , max_duration_last_30_days , window_duration_last_7_days , window_duration_last_30_days , last_change FROM dba_autotask_client

SELECT client_name , window_name , window_start_time , window_duration , jobs_created , jobs_started , jobs_completed , window_end_time FROM dba_autotask_client_history WHERE client_name = :CLIENT_NAME ORDER BY window_start_time
SELECT client_name , job_name , job_scheduler_status , task_name , task_target_type , task_target_name , task_priority , task_operation FROM dba_autotask_client_job WHERE client_name = :CLIENT_NAME

SELECT client_name , window_name , window_start_time , window_duration , job_name , job_status , job_start_time , job_duration , job_error , job_info FROM dba_autotask_job_history WHERE client_name = :CLIENT_NAME
SELECT client_name , operation_name , operation_tag , priority_override , attributes , use_resource_estimates , status , last_change FROM dba_autotask_operation WHERE client_name = :CLIENT_NAME

SELECT client_name , task_name , task_target_type , task_target_name , operation_name , attributes , task_priority , priority_override , status , deferred_window_name , current_job_name , job_scheduler_status , estimate_type , estimated_weight , estimated_duration , estimated_cpu_time , estimated_temp , estimated_dop , estimated_io_rate , estimated_undo_rate , retry_count , last_good_date , last_good_priority , last_good_duration , last_good_cpu_time , last_good_temp , last_good_dop , last_good_io_rate , last_good_undo_rate , last_good_cpu_wait , last_good_io_wait , last_good_undo_wait , last_good_temp_wait , last_good_concurrency , last_good_contention , next_try_date , last_try_date , last_try_priority , last_try_result , last_try_duration , last_try_cpu_time , last_try_temp , last_try_dop , last_try_io_rate , last_try_undo_rate , last_try_cpu_wait , last_try_io_wait , last_try_undo_wait , last_try_temp_wait , last_try_concurrency , last_try_contention , mean_good_duration , mean_good_cpu_time , mean_good_temp , mean_good_dop , mean_good_io , mean_good_undo , mean_good_cpu_wait , mean_good_io_wait , mean_good_undo_wait , mean_good_temp_wait , mean_good_concurrency , mean_good_contention , info_field_1 , info_field_2 , info_field_3 , info_field_4 FROM dba_autotask_task WHERE client_name = :CLIENT_NAME

Select 'BEGIN DBMS_AUTO_TASK_ADMIN.'|| CASE WHEN :STATUS = 'ENABLED' THEN 'disable(' WHEN :STATUS = 'DISABLED' THEN 'enable(' END ||'client_name =>'|| ''''||:CLIENT_NAME||''''||', operation => NULL, window_name => NULL); END; /' from dual

SELECT window_name , window_next_time , window_active , autotask_status , optimizer_stats , segment_advisor , sql_tune_advisor , health_monitor FROM dba_autotask_window_clients ORDER BY window_next_time
SELECT window_name , start_time , duration FROM dba_autotask_schedule WHERE window_name = :WINDOW_NAME
SELECT window_name , window_start_time , window_end_time FROM dba_autotask_window_history WHERE window_name = :WINDOW_NAME

Select 'BEGIN DBMS_AUTO_TASK_ADMIN.'|| CASE WHEN :OPTIMIZER_STATS = 'ENABLED' THEN 'disable(' WHEN :OPTIMIZER_STATS = 'DISABLED' THEN 'enable(' END ||'client_name => '||''''||'auto optimizer stats collection'||''''||','||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'operation => NULL,'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'window_name =>'||''''||:WINDOW_NAME||''''||')'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'END'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| '/' "ENABLE/DISABLE" from dual Union Select 'BEGIN DBMS_AUTO_TASK_ADMIN.'|| CASE WHEN :SEGMENT_ADVISOR = 'ENABLED' THEN 'disable(' WHEN :SEGMENT_ADVISOR = 'DISABLED' THEN 'enable(' END ||'client_name => '||''''||'auto space advisor'||''''||','||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'operation => NULL,'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'window_name =>'||''''||:WINDOW_NAME||''''||')'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'END'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| '/' from dual Union Select 'BEGIN DBMS_AUTO_TASK_ADMIN.'|| CASE WHEN :SQL_TUNE_ADVISOR = 'ENABLED' THEN 'disable(' WHEN :SQL_TUNE_ADVISOR = 'DISABLED' THEN 'enable(' END ||'client_name => '||''''||'sql tuning advisor'||''''||','||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'operation => NULL,'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'window_name =>'||''''||:WINDOW_NAME||''''||')'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'END'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| '/' from dual
